message: Currently @matze and me are developing Convorsation. If you want to support us, follow this link: https://flattr.com/thing/171699/Convorsation-Android-client-for-convore-com
To those who've never heard about Flattr, take a look at this video: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kwvExIWf_Uc
I might also suggest offering a "pro" version of the app, as that already has my payment information, etc :)
